EducationSector.description: The sector of education the student belongs to

value_dict.Others: Student belongs to other education sectors
value_dict.Economic Sciences, Business Studies, Com: Student belongs to Economic Sciences, Business Studies, Commerce and Law
value_dict.Art, Music or Design: Student belongs to Art, Music or Design
value_dict.Humanities and Social Sciences: Student belongs to Humanities and Social Sciences
value_dict.Medicine, Health Sciences: Student belongs to Medicine, Health Sciences
value_dict.Teaching Degree (e.g., B.Ed): Student is pursuing a Teaching Degree (e.g., B.Ed)
value_dict.Mathematics or Natural Sciences: Student belongs to Mathematics or Natural Sciences
value_dict.Language and Cultural Studies: Student belongs to Language and Cultural Studies

IndividualProject.description: Whether the student has done any individual projects

value_dict.No: Student has not done any individual projects

City.description: The city where the student lives

value_dict.No: Student does not live in a city

Influenced.description: Whether the student is influenced by someone or not

value_dict.No: Student is not influenced by anyone

DesireToTakeInitiative.description: The desire level of the student to take initiatives

StrongNeedToAchieve.description: The level of strong need to achieve in the student

GoodPhysicalHealth.description: Whether the student is in good physical health or not

value_dict.3: Student rates their physical health as 3
value_dict.4: Student rates their physical health as 4
value_dict.2: Student rates their physical health as 2
value_dict.1: Student rates their physical health as 1
value_dict.5: Student rates their physical health as 5

MentalDisorder.description: Whether the student has any mental disorders or not

value_dict.No: Student does not have a mental disorder

value_dict.Passion: One of the key traits of the student is Passion

value_dict.Resilience: One of the key traits of the student is Resilience
value_dict.Positivity: One of the key traits of the student is Positivity
